channel.title: maps on Brian Weinstein
channel.description: Recent content in maps on Brian Weinstein

item.title: Mapping the frozen yogurt shop closest to each Manhattan apartment
item.description: originally published on Fouriest Series I love frozen yogurt. When I first moved to New York three years ago, I lived only 1/8th of a mile from the closest froyo shop. The convenience of this 4-minute walk is something I neither appreciated nor utilized enough at the time. After moving to Harlem last year, it’s been harder than ever to satisfy my near-constant craving for this cold candy soup — I’m now a 24-minute walk to the nearest frozen yogurt.
